## Overview

- Problem statement and motivation.
- High-level approach (e.g., model family, key techniques).

- Bullet 1 (e.g., End-to-end training and inference pipeline).

- Bullet 3 (e.g., Docker support / Ray distributed training / HF integration).

## Project Structure

```text
repo-root/
  ├── src/                 # Core source code
  ├── configs/             # Training/inference configs
  ├── data/                # Local data (or pointers)
  ├── notebooks/           # EDA & experimentation
  ├── models/              # Saved weights / checkpoints
  ├── scripts/             # Helper scripts (train, eval, etc.)
  ├── tests/               # Unit and integration tests
  ├── requirements.txt     # Python dependencies
  ├── pyproject.toml       # (optional) build/packaging
  └── README.md
